Leverage the power of a wearable device to enhance the business travel experience

2016 –Egencia Apple Watch app

Expedia, Inc. – Egencia Business Travel
WatchOS, Wearables
Role: Sr. Product Designer
Team: Seattle, WA
Goal: Use contextual notifications and quick interactions to reduce in trip friction.

Apple watch can be a powerful tool to reduce fiction when done well, at Egencia we wanted to make sure we could bring meaningful interactions to Wearables.
